list.title: Software Engineering Intern
descriptionList: Identified opportunities for process automation within the transportation system, leading to a 15% reduction in transportation costs, resulting in $1.2M annual savings.
Contributed to the development and deployment of an improved demand forecasting algorithm, resulting in a 17% reduction in backorders to retail partners, streamlining inventory management.
Conducted extensive user research and gathered valuable insights through focus groups, which played a key role in boosting sales by 15% in the NW region.
Implemented new features and performed bug fixes for the company's flagship product, contributing to enhanced product stability and a more seamless user experience.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to propose innovative solutions, resulting in improved efficiency and communication between departments.
